cyclone.name: HANNA
cyclone.current_location: about 405 mi ESE of Port O’Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the north-western Gulf of Mexico toward the central-south Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: between Port O’Connor and Corpus Christi, Texas

weather_observation.watch_coast: Port Mansfield to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire Texas coast from Port Mansfield northward to High Island and adjacent Louisiana coastline
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force gusts (35–40 mph) possible late Friday into Saturday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge 1–3 ft possible along the upper Texas coast
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–5 inches with isolated totals up to 8 inches may cause flash flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along Gulf beaches
